name: Obey (itch) (DeagleDryan, oprimeolt, Exuin, OriphielBlanco, Ageo)
description:
We're the Full Bottle Studios team, and this is our first game we've made together. We had an incredible adventure during this week for the development of this game, where we have learned many things, but always keeping the idea of creating an environment of fun and teamwork. 

We made this game based on an idea and a reality that a member of the team is experiencing as well as many other people in the world, misinformation is real and this is present, many media will say that it is real but we say that: It is not real. 

MEMBERS IN NOT PARTICULAR ORDER: 

- @DeagleDryan (Programmer)

- @emily2 Artist)

- @Ageo (Artist)

- Oprime (Designer)

- CHXIR (Composer)

- @OriphielBlanco (Creative Director)

GAMEJAM: 

 This game is made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1
